00029 namespace Perseus {
00030   namespace EEPROM {
00031     struct cmd {
00032       boost::int8_t   op;
00033       boost::uint16_t addr;
00034       boost::uint8_t  count;
00035     } __attribute__((__packed__)) ;
00036     
00037     struct reply_header {
00038       boost::uint8_t op;
00039       boost::int8_t  op_retcode;
00040     } __attribute__((__packed__)) ;
00041     
00042     template<size_t N>
00043     struct reply {
00044       reply_header   header;
00045       boost::uint8_t data[N];
00046     } __attribute__((__packed__)) ;
00047   } //  namespace EEPROM
00048 
00049   namespace FPGA {
00050     template<typename T>
00051     struct sio_cmd {
00052       sio_cmd(boost::uint8_t c)
00053         : cmd(c) {}
00054       sio_cmd(boost::uint8_t c, const T& d)
00055         : cmd(c), data(d) {}
00056       boost::uint8_t cmd;
00057       T data;
00058     } __attribute__((__packed__));
00059   }

00061 
00062   class fx2_control_impl : public fx2_control {
00063   public:
00064     struct CMD {
00065       enum {
00066         fpga_config = 0x00,
00067         fpga_reset  = 0x01,
00068         fpga_check  = 0x02,
00069         fpga_sio    = 0x03,
00070         fx2_port    = 0x04,
00071         eeprom_read = 0x06,
00072         shutdown    = 0x08
00073       } ;
00074     } ;
00075     struct FX2 {
00076       enum {
00077         vendor_request = 0x40,
00078         firmware_load  = 0xA0,
00079         addr_cpucs     = 0xE600,
00080         usb_timeout    = 1000
00081       } ; 
00082     } ;
00083 
00084     fx2_control_impl(boost::uint16_t vendor_id,
00085                      boost::uint16_t product_id,
00086                      size_t index)
00087       : _vendor_id(vendor_id)
00088       , _product_id(product_id)
00089       , _index     (index)
00090       , _is_configured(false) {
00091       try {
00092         const std::vector<usb_device_handle::sptr>
00093           v(usb_device_handle::get_device_list(_vendor_id, _product_id));
00094         ASSERT_THROW(_index < v.size());
00095         _usb_device_handle = v[index];
00096         _usb_control = usb_control::make(_usb_device_handle, 1);
00097         _usb_control->clear_halt(EndPoint::cmd);
00098         _usb_control->clear_halt(EndPoint::status);
00099         _usb_control->clear_halt(EndPoint::data_in);
00100         
00101         _perseus_eeprom_pid = read_eeprom<Perseus::product_id>(EEPROM::ADDR::product_id);
00102         LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("device '%s' is already configured")
00103                      % _perseus_eeprom_pid.to_str()));
00104         _is_configured = true;
00105       } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00106         LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("fx2_control_impl::fx2_control_impl exception: '%s'") % e.what()));
00107         // no further action
00108       }
00109     }
00110 
00111     virtual ~fx2_control_impl() {
00112       if (is_configured()) {
00113         try {
00114           this->shutdown();
00115         } catch (...) {
00116           LOG_ERROR("fx2_control_impl::~fx2_control_impl: ERROR");
00117         }
00118       }
00119     }
00120         
00121     virtual usb_control::sptr get_usb_control() { return _usb_control; }
00122     virtual usb_device_handle::sptr get_usb_device_handle() { return _usb_device_handle; }
00123 
00124     virtual bool is_configured() const { return _is_configured; }
00125     
00126     virtual void load_firmware(std::string hex_filename) {
00127       this->reset(1);
00128       std::ifstream ifs(hex_filename.c_str());
00129       std::string line("");
00130       while (ifs>>line) {
00131         const I8HEXEntry hex(line);
00132         if (hex.get_type() == I8HEXEntry::EndOfFileRecord) break;
00133         ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_control(FX2::vendor_request,
00134                                                   FX2::firmware_load, hex.get_addr(), 0,
00135                                                   (unsigned char*)(&hex.get_code().front()),
00136                                                   hex.get_code().size(), FX2::usb_timeout)
00137                      == ssize_t(hex.get_code().size()));
00138       }
00139       this->reset(0);
00140       _is_configured = true;
00141       _usb_control.reset();
00142       _usb_device_handle.reset();
00143       LOG_INFO("USB renumeration...");
00144       sleep(4); // USB renumeration
00145       LOG_INFO("... finished");
00146 
00147       const std::vector<usb_device_handle::sptr>
00148         v(usb_device_handle::get_device_list(_vendor_id, _product_id));
00149       ASSERT_THROW(_index < v.size());
00150       _usb_device_handle = v[_index];
00151       _usb_control = usb_control::make(_usb_device_handle, 1);
00152     }
00153 
00154     virtual void load_fpga(std::string filename) {
00155       fpga_reset();
00156       std::ifstream ifs(filename.c_str(), std::ios::binary);
00157       FPGA::sio_cmd<char[63]> cmd(CMD::fpga_config);
00158       while (ifs.read(cmd.data, 63))
00159         fpga_load_line(cmd, ifs.gcount());
00160 
00161       fpga_load_line(cmd, ifs.gcount());
00162       fpga_check();
00163     }
00164 
00165     virtual boost::uint8_t set_port(boost::uint8_t port) {
00166       int transferred(0);
00167       const boost::uint8_t cmd[2] = {CMD::fx2_port, port};
00168       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::cmd,
00169                                              (unsigned char *)&cmd, sizeof(cmd),
00170                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00171       ASSERT_THROW(transferred==sizeof(cmd));
00172       return port;
00173     }
00174         
00175     FPGA::sioctl fpga_sio(const FPGA::sioctl& sio_cmd) {
00176       int transferred(0);
00177       const FPGA::sio_cmd<FPGA::sioctl> cmd_in(CMD::fpga_sio, sio_cmd);
00178       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::cmd,
00179                                              (unsigned char *)&cmd_in, sizeof(cmd_in),
00180                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00181       ASSERT_THROW(transferred == sizeof(cmd_in));
00182       FPGA::sio_cmd<FPGA::sioctl> cmd_response(CMD::fpga_sio);
00183       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::status,
00184                                              (unsigned char *)&cmd_response, sizeof(cmd_response),
00185                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);      
00186       ASSERT_THROW(transferred == sizeof(cmd_response));
00187       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("sio: freg=%d response.cmd=%d response.data.ctl=%d response.data.freg=%d")
00188                    % int(sio_cmd.freg)
00189                    % int(cmd_response.cmd)
00190                    % int(cmd_response.data.ctl)
00191                    % int(cmd_response.data.freg)));
00192       return cmd_response.data;
00193     }
00194 
00195     virtual const Perseus::product_id& get_eeprom_pid(std::string firmware_filename="perseus.hex") {
00196       if (not is_configured()) {
00197         load_firmware(firmware_filename);
00198         _perseus_eeprom_pid = this->read_eeprom<product_id>(EEPROM::ADDR::product_id);
00199       }
00200       return _perseus_eeprom_pid;
00201     }
00202 
00203   protected:
00204     virtual eeprom_data read_eeprom_lowlevel(boost::uint16_t addr, size_t length) {
00205       int transferred(0);
00206       const EEPROM::cmd cmd = {CMD::eeprom_read, addr, length};
00207       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::cmd,
00208                                              (unsigned char *)&cmd, sizeof(cmd),
00209                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00210       const size_t max_length(10*1024);
00211       EEPROM::reply<max_length> reply;
00212       ASSERT_THROW(length < max_length);
00213       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::status,
00214                                              (unsigned char *)&reply, 
00215                                              sizeof(EEPROM::reply_header) + length,
00216                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00217       ASSERT_THROW(transferred == int(sizeof(EEPROM::reply_header) + length));
00218       ASSERT_THROW(reply.header.op_retcode == true);
00219       return eeprom_data(reply.data, reply.data+length);
00220     }
00221 
00222   private:
00223 
00224     void fpga_load_line(const FPGA::sio_cmd<char[63]>& cmd,
00225                         std::streamsize gcount) {
00226       if (gcount == 0) return;
00227       int transferred(0);
00228       const ssize_t len(1+gcount);
00229       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::cmd,
00230                                              (unsigned char *)&cmd, len,
00231                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00232       ASSERT_THROW(transferred==len);
00233     }
00234 
00235     void fpga_reset() {
00236       int transferred(0);
00237       const boost::uint8_t cmd(CMD::fpga_reset);
00238       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::cmd,
00239                                              (unsigned char *)&cmd, sizeof(cmd),
00240                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00241       ASSERT_THROW(transferred == sizeof(cmd));
00242     }
00243 
00244     bool fpga_check() {
00245       int transferred(0);
00246       const boost::uint8_t cmd(CMD::fpga_check);
00247       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::cmd,
00248                                              (unsigned char *)&cmd, sizeof(cmd),
00249                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00250       ASSERT_THROW(transferred == sizeof(cmd));
00251 
00252       // wait 50 ms
00253       const clock_t endclock(clock() + 50*CLOCKS_PER_SEC/1000);
00254       while (clock() < endclock) ;
00255 
00256       boost::uint8_t cmdcheck_status[2] = {0, 0};
00257       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::status,
00258                                              (unsigned char *)&cmdcheck_status, sizeof(cmdcheck_status),
00259                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00260       ASSERT_THROW(transferred == sizeof(cmdcheck_status));
00261       if (cmdcheck_status[1] != true) {
00262         LOG_ERROR(str(boost::format("fpga_check error[%d,%d]")
00263                       % int(cmdcheck_status[0])
00264                       % int(cmdcheck_status[1])));
00265           ASSERT_THROW(cmdcheck_status[1] == true);
00266       }
00267       return true;
00268     }
00269     
00270     void reset(boost::uint8_t reset) {
00271       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_control(FX2::vendor_request,
00272                                                 FX2::firmware_load,
00273                                                 FX2::addr_cpucs, 0, &reset, 1, FX2::usb_timeout) == 1);
00274     }
00275     void shutdown() {
00276       int transferred(0);
00277       const boost::uint8_t cmd_shutdown(CMD::shutdown);
00278       ASSERT_THROW(_usb_control->submit_bulk(EndPoint::cmd,
00279                                              (unsigned char *)&cmd_shutdown, sizeof(cmd_shutdown),
00280                                              &transferred, FX2::usb_timeout) == 0);
00281       ASSERT_THROW(transferred == sizeof(cmd_shutdown));
00282     }
00283 
00284     usb_control::sptr       _usb_control;
00285     usb_device_handle::sptr _usb_device_handle;
00286     boost::uint16_t     _vendor_id;
00287     boost::uint16_t     _product_id;
00288     size_t              _index;
00289     bool                _is_configured;
00290     Perseus::product_id _perseus_eeprom_pid;
00291   } ;
00292 
00293   fx2_control::sptr fx2_control::make(boost::uint16_t vendor_id,
00294                                       boost::uint16_t product_id,
00295                                       size_t index) {
00296     return fx2_control::sptr(new fx2_control_impl(vendor_id, product_id, index));
00297   }
00298 } // namespace Perseus
